hero.title: The magic is in simplicity.
hero.subtitle: ðŸ˜Ž Scroll to see more cool things about us.

simplicity.title: We like simplicity.
simplicity.subtitle: And we will share it with you.
simplicity.text: All people are complicated, and that's a problem. We want to share our simplicity with you. That's why every service we provide is incredibly simple and intuitive.

beauty.title: We love beauty.
beauty.subtitle: And we don't mind sharing it with you.
beauty.text: Simplicity is good, isn't it? Well, what if we add Beauty to this Simplicity? That's how you get the perfect product! And that's what we're trying to achieve.

promotions.bokkr: bokkr - experimental site only for approved comics, books and so on. A lot of experiments and a lot of unforgetable adventures!
promotions.pigeon: Pigeon Messenger - is a messenger to rule them all! Now you needen't to switch between different web-messengers. Now all your chats will be in one place, without any switching!

userApps.title: user apps
userApps.description: Huge number of other applications created by other people! They can be quite interesting, but also there can be a lot of them!

loginPage.userAgreement: By continuing, you agreeing to the User Agreement.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Requested content could not be found. You should double-check that the data is spelled correctly.
